description.intro: MIT is a student-run community built to support Muslim students in Hungary, help them connect, grow, and feel at home.
description.activities: We organize events, gatherings, study sessions, charity activities, and spiritual programs — all in a positive, respectful, and welcoming environment.

youthLeadership.title: Youth Leadership Workshop
youthLeadership.desc: Empowering young minds ✨ Learn leadership, teamwork, public speaking, and more.

communityFootball.title: Community Football Day
communityFootball.desc: Teamwork, vibes, good energy ⚽ Bring friends and join local mini-tournaments.

winterCharity.title: Winter Charity Drive
winterCharity.desc: Small acts, big impact ❄️ Collect donations for families in need.
